original_text: Then the king of the south will be very angry. He will march with his army to fight against the king of the north. The king from the north will also have a large army, but the king of the south will win the battle.
korean_text: 남방 왕은 크게 노하여 나와서 북방 왕과 싸울 것이라 북방 왕이 큰 무리를 일으킬 것이나 그 무리는 그의 손에 넘겨 준 바 되리라

sentences.original_text: Then the king of the south will be very angry.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 남방의 왕이 매우 분노할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: He will march with his army
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그의 군대와 함께 행진할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: to fight against the king of the north.
The king from the north will also have a large army,
sentences.korean_translation: 북방의 왕 역시 큰 군대를 가질 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: but the king of the south will win the battle.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 남방의 왕이 전투에서 승리할 것입니다.
